ygData.subject: Re: Purposes of misc items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: LKW  ... never came across them before in EQ. Prolly Gary and Alex can help you with that ;-) As for other minor loots,
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>From: "Wilson" <ritzbits@...>
>What is TIA?
>TIA = Thx in advance ;)
>> Aiyo! Pai seh! Pai seh! Thanks for enlightening me!

>Other than beetle eyes which newbies can loot from minor monsters, how abt
>royal jelly, bat wing etc loot tat can easily get from minor monsters, any
>use?
>> Royal Jelly is good for real life health <grins> sorry dude. But I've
never came across them before in EQ. Prolly Gary and Alex can help you with
that ;-)
As for other minor loots, *most* are useless. I am not based in Freeport
area so pardon me sir.

Love,
Wilson
